venue.address_1: For directions please call Sherry and Sarah at 978-897-6239
venue.name: Maynard

item.description:
From 4:00 to 6:00 we will discuss When Bad Things Happen to Good People, an oldie-but-goodie (1978), by Rabbi Harold S. Kushner.

All are welcome to stay after the book discussion for an informal potluck as we continue an open discussion of vegan related topics.    

When Bad Things Happen to Good People grapples with why God lets bad things happen (from a vegan perspective, to good and innocent animals), and may help with our emotional reactions when doing outreach, or just living among carnivists (Matthew Candelaria's term for those whose unconscious culture is to eat flesh).

For directions, call Sherry and Sarah at 978-897-6239, option 3.
item.name: Book Group and Aprés POT LUCK
